attributes.action: pledge money and government support to purchase adaptive computing technology for UK children on the Autistic Spectrum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has recently unveiled plans to tackle social exclusion in England by implementing a range of measures to help adults with Autism have "rewarding and fulfilling lives" through a strategy to form a "foundation for change". 

We petition the government to take these plans further by pledging money to purchase adapted computer technology for children in the UK with Autism, to allow them to achieve their full potential prior to adulthood, and go on to make a positive contribution in society and the employment market. This campaign is supported by ICT4Autism, a charity dedicated to improving the lives of children with Autism by providing otherwise unaffordable technology.
